1.content:
One day, I was sleeping and I woke up in an empty room. "What is this?!" I said. And then I met my friend Shadow. "Oh hi Shadow." I said. He waved back to me. "Where am I?" I asked. "You're in a reality Lauren. We have to find a way to get out of here." Shadow said. "Come with me."

So Shadow took my hand and led me. Where will we go?
1.title: I have the most bizarre adventure!

choices: We end up at a radio station
We have to go through onstacles
12.content:
We both ended up on the side of the road. But thank goodness we weren't getting hit by cars. "Look over there!" I pointed out to Shadow. It was Ren and Stimpy doing a traffic report. "Who is it?" Shadow asked. "Don't you remember? It's Ren and Stimpy!" I yelled. "Oh yeah!" Shadow said. "Maybe they will give us a ride to get us out of here." I said. "Good idea Lauren, let's go say hello to them." Shadow said.

Shadow and I then went over to Ren and Stimpy. "Hello can I help you?" Stimpy asked. "We need a ride." I said. "Yeah it's important." Shadow said. "I'll explain everything on the way." I said. "Sure hop in." Stimpy said. "Always nice to meet hitchhikers." Ren said. Then Shadow and I both hopped in Ren and Stimpy's car. After that, we drove away.
12.title: The side of the road

121.content:
"You see guys, I woke up in an empty room and met Shadow. Then we both ended up on the side of the road. So that's all I can say, after all, I don't know where I really am." I said. "Oh I see." Ren said, "So you're in the middle of nowhere, who cares." "Ren," Stimpy said to him, "Now guys, where you really are is..." "Where?" I asked. "Oh you're in a reality, that's it." Stimpy said. "Yeah and that is when you guys end up in different dimensions." Ren said. "So what'll happen if we keep entering dimensions?" I asked. "Yeah, I want to find out too." Shadow said. "That's just eet, we don't know. That's for the Reality Police to decide." Ren said.

Then I screamed. "Oh no! Shadow, we're gonna be in big trouble!" I yelled. "Uh oh." Shadow said, "What'll we do?" "I don't know but I'll think of something." I said. "Where are we going?" Shadow asked Stimpy. "We're going to our home. You can stay there until you guys find your way back home." Stimpy said. Shadow then nodded his head to show that he understood. Although I was still worried about what was happening to us. What's gonna happen? Find out in this next, exciting chapter!
121.title: I explain everything

1211.content:
At Ren and Stimpy's house, I was chasing Ren cause I love him! I was attempting to kiss him. But then he farted. So after that I laughed and Ren smiled at me. "Wow, you laugh at everything don't you?" Ren asked me. "Yeah." I said. Ren also burped. I laughed again. "Lauren, what are you doing? We have to find our way home." Shadow said. "I'm just playing around Shadow. Don't worry, we'll find it." I said.

And so I playfully tickled him. He giggled but was very serious. "I'm going to go get something to eat." I said. And I ate what was my favorite until I got full. "Oh boy, what a feast. I'm surely not going to do that again." I said, "I'm going to bed." I then slept in the middle of the bed. Ren was on one side and Stimpy was on the other. Shadow laid on top of me.

What's going to happen in the next chapter? We'll just have to wait and see.
1211.title: At Ren and Stimpy's house...

12113.content:
It was at that moment we were now in a random location in this case a place called acme acres and we were in a room with shirley the loon of course who quickly noticed us of course.

Shirley the loon: what are you two doing here she asked and who are you two anyway she asked.

That's when we introduced ourselves to shirley the loon of course.

Lauren: My name's lauren and this is my pet shadow.

Shadow: hey how's it going?

That's when shirley introduced herself of course and explained what was happening and also what show we were in.

Shirley the loon: It turns out you're both on a show called tiny toon adventures and the segment we're in is called duck out of luck. And in case you didn't know we're about to run into trouble of course.

Lauren & shadow: Trouble? they both asked her.

But it was too late as a giant sized green duck proceeded to grab shirley the loon and myself course and then we were now captives of duck kong himself.

Duck kong: gotcha, hey i was never able pick up girls like this before he said with a sly grin.

At that moment shadow couldn't help but feel he needed to something quickly.

Shadow: This is going to require more than the powers of an ordinary pet he boldly said. This looks like a job for super shadow he said.

And so shadow conjured up a bottle of jumbo gro and drank it all down until he was at least 100 times his normal size and quickly proceeded to scale the building itself and upon reaching the top he found duck kong and us both, then began to confront the green monster duck himself.

Super shadow: Put those two down at once bellowed the now supersized dalmatian dog who appeared to be wearing a king kong sized superman costume.

Duck kong: who said that asked the green monster sized duck.

Super shadow: I did answered the gigantic dalmatian.

At that moment it looked like both super shadow and duck kong were about to do battle of course. But what was going to happen next shirley and i wondered.
12113.title: Random

121131.content:
Super Shadow and Duck Kong did a battle. They had to duel of course.

Super Shadow: We're going to duel as our battle. If I win, I get Shirley the Loon and if you win, you can keep her.
Duck Kong: Fair enough.
They each had a pile of cards.
Super Shadow decided what to do first.
Super Shadow gave Duck Kong a punch in the arm. That's what the card said.
They were each beating each other up.
Later, they were slapping each other.
Me: Whoah, this is a great battle.
Duck Kong got tired of the hand slapping with Shadow that he fell down.
Duck Kong: Ok, you win.
Then he handed Shirley to Super Shadow.
And she kissed him.
Shirley: My hero!
Me: Yay! I think you're great as Super Shadow.
Super Shadow: Yeah, I guess I am.
Then Super Shadow and I went home.
121131.title: Super shadow vs duck kong.

choices: A group of rival heel wrestlers show up.
125.content:
Sometime later on both Ren and Stimpy pulled to a stop as we arrived at our destination mainly an training center of some sorts.

"Thanks for the lift guys we really appreciate that." Lauren said.

"Yeah thanks for the lift and also drive safely guys." Shadow said.

"No problem as it was great and all that." Stimpy said.

"Well we better get going, in other words Hasta la bye bye." Ren said as they both drove off into the distance.

Lauren and Shadow then walked towards the training center as they opened the building's front doors and walked in as they closed the building's doors as they noticed this was a training center for pro wrestlers.

"It appears to be a training center for pro wrestlers and whatnot as there appears to be weights, barbells, and a wrestling ring or two as well." Lauren said.

"You're right and as this is a training center for pro wrestlers, there must be some pro wrestlers that train here all the time." Shadow said.

At that very moment a few massive pro wrestlers in other words a few face aligned massive pro wrestlers stomped on over to where Lauren and Shadow were at along with their managers as these animated characters are from 101 Dalmatian Street and also anthropomorphic as well.

"That's right for after all there are pro wrestlers that train here of course and also allow me to introduce myself and my wife in other words Douglas and Delilah dalmatian." Douglas dalmatian said.

"And who are these pro wrestlers?" Shadow asked.

"Allow us to introduce to you our group of pro wrestlers, starting with our son Dylan dalmatian as he's known as the big dog, next up is Dolly dalmatian also known as the amazing colossal Dolly, as we also have with us Hansel the husky as he's known as Hansel the giant, now up next is Fergus Fox as he's known as Fox Kong and last but certainly not least our three daughters Destiny Dallas and Deja Vu also known as Triple D." Their managers said as they introduced their group of wrestlers.
125.title: Random

choices: In the White Queen's castle as a white pawn
In the Red Queen's castle but as a white pawn
15.content:
At first you were stunned to see the giant land of chess on the other side of the the door. Many hills scattered before you covered with what seemed to be red and white grass, all layered out like the squares of a chessboard.

"How did we get here?" You ask Shadow. "What is this place."

"The land of chess, my dear," says a woman who seemed to appear out of nowhere. You wonder how it's possible that you didn't notice her sooner, as she is wearing the most striking red dress and a ruby encrusted crown.

"Who are you?" You ask.

The woman instantly disappears and re-appears behind you again.

"I'm the Red Queen," she replies. "And you are interrupting the game, so please leave the chess board."

"Shadow, what's going on here?"

You look at your friend, waiting for an answer. You then notice that he's dressed only in white, which is unusual for him since he's usually in black.

"What are you wearing?"

"Look, I can't explain it to you right now because . . . AAAAAA!!!!"

Shadow suddenly disappears before your very eyes, and you know who is to blame as you watch the red queen raise her perfectly manicured hand.

"What did you do?" You demand angrily. "Where's my friend."

"Calm yourself, darling," she tells you. "He'll return once the game is over. Of course, that may take a while since his rank still has a queen as well."

"You'd better explain to me what's going on or things are gonna get ugly."

"Alright, darling, if you insist. You are in chessland, a divided kingdom in wonderland. Your friend joined the game years ago as a bishop, but now he's finally been captured by me."

"Years?" You ask, bewildered. "Wait! What is wonderland."

"Oh, you must be from the other dimension. Your friend Shadow is a wizard, and he opened the portal to this dimension, which is home to wonderland and many other kingdoms. He must have opened the portal for you so that you could help him. I was on his tail for quite some time."

"Alright, so this game has been going on for years."

"Yes, with many pieces captured, including my mother, the original red queen."

The queen in chess can move as many spaces as she wants in any direction, this is why the red queen is able to move so fast.

"Enough chatter for now, darling. If you wish to play the game and save your friend you must become a white pawn, the weakest of all pieces."

"Why?"

"You're a human, and the last thing I need is another on of you in my rank. As far as I'm concerned, you're the white queen's problem. I'll give you a head start, but I warn you that the red pieces shall be brutal and torture you before cl when they see you. This is no game, girl. Be cautious in these lands."

The red queen raises her palm and sends you away. When you wake up, you are . . .
15.title: Welcome to Wonderland

info.brief_description: Just a compilation of random stories.
info.description:
Just a series of random stories, enjoy.

RULES:
NO Sexual Content or ANYTHING Inappropriate!
NO Bad Language!
Has to be related to a CHAPTER!
Have fun!
